delta-spot.script:
_vbuy = (BINANCE:btcbusd.vbuy+BINANCE:btcusdc.vbuy+BINANCE:btcusdt.vbuy+BITFINEX:BTCUSD.vbuy+BITFINEX:BTCUST.vbuy+BITSTAMP:btcusd.vbuy+BITSTAMP:btcusdc.vbuy+BITSTAMP:btcusdt.vbuy+BYBIT:BTCUSDC-SPOT.vbuy+BYBIT:BTCUSDT-SPOT.vbuy+COINBASE:BTC-USD.vbuy+COINBASE:BTC-USDC.vbuy+COINBASE:BTC-USDT.vbuy+KRAKEN:XBT/USD.vbuy+KRAKEN:XBT/USDC.vbuy+KRAKEN:XBT/USDT.vbuy+POLONIEX:BUSD_BTC.vbuy+POLONIEX:USDC_BTC.vbuy+POLONIEX:USDT_BTC.vbuy+PHEMEX:sBTCUSDT.vbuy)
_vsell = (BINANCE:btcbusd.vsell+BINANCE:btcusdc.vsell+BINANCE:btcusdt.vsell+BITFINEX:BTCUSD.vsell+BITFINEX:BTCUST.vsell+BITSTAMP:btcusd.vsell+BITSTAMP:btcusdc.vsell+BITSTAMP:btcusdt.vsell+BYBIT:BTCUSDC-SPOT.vsell+BYBIT:BTCUSDT-SPOT.vsell+COINBASE:BTC-USD.vsell+COINBASE:BTC-USDC.vsell+COINBASE:BTC-USDT.vsell+KRAKEN:XBT/USD.vsell+KRAKEN:XBT/USDC.vsell+KRAKEN:XBT/USDT.vsell+POLONIEX:BUSD_BTC.vsell+POLONIEX:USDC_BTC.vsell+POLONIEX:USDT_BTC.vsell+PHEMEX:sBTCUSDT.vsell)

volume = _vbuy+_vsell
a = sma(Math.pow(volume,2),options.length)
b = Math.pow(sum(volume,options.length),2)/Math.pow(options.length,2)
stdev = Math.sqrt(a - b)
basis = sma(volume, options.length)
dev = 1 * stdev
treshold = basis + dev

delta = _vbuy - _vsell

plothistogram({ time: time, value: (delta), color: delta > 0 ? ( volume > treshold ? options.upColorHighVol : options.upColorLowVol) : ( volume > treshold ? options.downColorHighVol : options.downColorLowVol)}, title="Delta Spot")
delta-spot.name: Delta Spot

delta-perps.script:
_vbuy = (BINANCE_FUTURES:btcbusd.vbuy+BINANCE_FUTURES:btcusd_perp.vbuy+BINANCE_FUTURES:btcusdt.vbuy+BITFINEX:BTCF0:USTF0.vbuy+BITMEX:XBTUSD.vbuy+BITMEX:XBTUSDT.vbuy+BITMEX:XBT_USDT.vbuy+BYBIT:BTCUSD.vbuy+BYBIT:BTCUSDT.vbuy+DERIBIT:BTC-PERPETUAL.vbuy+DERIBIT:BTC_USDC-PERPETUAL.vbuy+DYDX:BTC-USD.vbuy+KRAKEN:PI_XBTUSD.vbuy)
_vsell = (BINANCE_FUTURES:btcbusd.vsell+BINANCE_FUTURES:btcusd_perp.vsell+BINANCE_FUTURES:btcusdt.vsell+BITFINEX:BTCF0:USTF0.vsell+BITMEX:XBTUSD.vsell+BITMEX:XBTUSDT.vsell+BITMEX:XBT_USDT.vsell+BYBIT:BTCUSD.vsell+BYBIT:BTCUSDT.vsell+DERIBIT:BTC-PERPETUAL.vsell+DERIBIT:BTC_USDC-PERPETUAL.vsell+DYDX:BTC-USD.vsell+KRAKEN:PI_XBTUSD.vsell)

volume = _vbuy+_vsell
a = sma(Math.pow(volume,2),options.length)
b = Math.pow(sum(volume,options.length),2)/Math.pow(options.length,2)
stdev = Math.sqrt(a - b)
basis = sma(volume, options.length)
dev = 1 * stdev
treshold = basis + dev

delta = _vbuy - _vsell

plothistogram({ time: time, value: (delta), color: delta > 0 ? ( volume > treshold ? options.upColorHighVol : options.upColorLowVol) : ( volume > treshold ? options.downColorHighVol : options.downColorLowVol)}, title="Delta Vadeli")
delta-perps.name: Delta Perps

volume.name: Volume

keltner-channel.script:
price = avg_ohlc(bar)
close = avg_close(bar)

range = price.high - price.low
averageRange = sma(range, options.length)

basis = ema(close, options.length)
dev = options.mult * averageRange
upper = basis + dev
lower = basis - dev

plotline(basis, color=options.basisColor)
plotcloudarea(lower, upper)
keltner-channel.name: Keltner Channel

_lrpbgi4l2n2otv0s.name: Chandelier Exit

_pemj9whxjyckoxq0.name: Liquidation Heatmap Light

leverages.description: Set leverage levels to simulate (use | or , separator, e.g., 5|20|100)

leverageBuffer.description: Buffer added to liquidation distance (% based). Higher values push zones farther.

originMode.description: Reference price used for calculating liquidation zones.

threshold.description: Minimum strength required to render a cell on the chart.

fadeAmount.description: Amount of strength to fade per bar for old cells (set 0 to disable).

maxDistance.description: Max % distance from priceRef close to draw a cell (0 = no limit).

fadeStart.description: Delay in bars before fading starts to apply to a cell.

autoScale.description: Grid cell size = ATR  this factor. Adjust for chart scaling.

autoScaleLength.description: Number of bars used to compute ATR for auto-scaling grid.

autoRescale.description: Auto-refresh cell grid every N bars (0 = disable auto-rescale).

resampleDecay.description: "Softens resampling when grid auto-rescales. 0 = even spread

fixedScale.description: Manual fixed cell size. Leave empty to use ATR-based auto scale.

volLength.description: Length for average buy/sell volume ratio smoothing.

strength.description: Amplifies visual weight of stronger zones (scaling multiplier).

quote.description: Select quote asset to fetch liquidity data from specific pairs.

exchange.description: Select exchange to fetch data from (if multiple supported).

type.description: Type of market to use (spot or perpetual).

useHK.description: Use Heikin-Ashi bars for source price instead of standard OHLC.

useLog.description: Apply logarithmic transform to volume ratios (helps normalization).

drawInfinite.description: Extend zone lines beyond the current viewport.

delta-binance-spot.script:
_vbuy = (BINANCE:btcbusd.vbuy+BINANCE:btcusdc.vbuy+BINANCE:btcusdt.vbuy)
_vsell = (BINANCE:btcbusd.vsell+BINANCE:btcusdc.vsell+BINANCE:btcusdt.vsell)

volume = _vbuy+_vsell
a = sma(Math.pow(volume,2),options.length)
b = Math.pow(sum(volume,options.length),2)/Math.pow(options.length,2)
stdev = Math.sqrt(a - b)
basis = sma(volume, options.length)
dev = 1 * stdev
treshold = basis + dev

delta = _vbuy - _vsell

plothistogram({ time: time, value: (delta), color: delta > 0 ? ( volume > treshold ? options.upColorHighVol : options.upColorLowVol) : ( volume > treshold ? options.downColorHighVol : options.downColorLowVol)}, title="Binance Spot")
delta-binance-spot.name: Delta Binance Spot
